hymn.title: But the God of all grace
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - C/E - | F - C/E - | F - C - | D - G - | F - C - | F - G - | Dm - G - | Em - Am - | F G C - | F - G - | Em - Am - | Dm7 - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: But the God of all grace, He who has called you in -- to His e -- ter -- nal glo -- ry In Christ Je -- sus, Af -- ter you have suf -- fered a lit -- tle while, Will Him -- self per -- fect, es -- tab -- lish, strength -- en, and ground you. To Him be the glo -- ry and the might for -- ev -- er and ev -- er. A -- men.

lyrics.stanza: But the God of all grace, He who has called you into His eternal glory In Christ Jesus, After you have suffered a little while, Will Himself perfect, establish, strengthen, and ground you.
To Him be the glory and the might forever and ever. Amen.
